product_name: Brooks England Imperial B-17 Saddle - Men's
long_description: The Brooks B-17 Imperial saddle is made from comfortable leather and features a center cutout for even more comfort. The center cutout relieves perineal pressure and saves overall weight. Leather provides natural "give" by stretching and flexing, and because it doesn't need padding, it's a cool option in warm weather. The saddle will age and break in over time. Bag loops permit the use of a traditional English-style touring bag on the rear of the seat.
short_description: The Brooks B-17 Imperial saddle is made from comfortable leather and features a center cutout for even more comfort.
